metadata.title: CVE-2024-42415 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the Compound Document BinaryFile format parser of v1.14.52 of the GNOME Project G Structured FileLibrary (libgsf). A specially crafted file can result in an integeroverflow that allows for a heap-based buffer overflow when processing thesector allocation table. This can lead to arbitrary code execution. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libgsf package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
